articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: India government under fire over fuel prices, opposition unites for protests
articles.description: Nationwide protests against record high petrol and diesel prices shut down businesses, government offices and schools in many parts of India on Monday, and in some places protesters blocked trains and roads and vandalized vehicles.

articles.description: Addressing mediapersons here, Congress general secretary in-charge of Gujarat, Rajeev Satav and state Congress president Amit Chavda said that the bandh would be observed peacefully without disturbing any essential service and emergency medical services.

articles.author: Jon Sharman, Jon Sharman
articles.title: Paris stabbing: Two UK tourists among seven injured in knife attack
articles.description: No initial indication assault is linked to terror

articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: Gujarat confidential: Poster Ki Baat
articles.description: Lapping up the poster of the upcoming Hindi movie ‘Super 30’, starring Hrithik Roshan, within hours of it being released on Wednesday, Twitter handles of several BJP MLAs were seen tweeting and retweeting a “Modi-fied” version of the poster

articles.author: Shehab Khan, Shehab Khan
articles.title: Amount of NHS land for sale rockets by nearly one-third in a year, figures suggest
articles.description: More than four times as much property on the market now than in 2015-16, two years ago, claims Labour

articles.author: Deeptiman Tiwary
articles.title: PNB fraud case: ED tells Interpol to desist from leaking info to Mehul Choksi
articles.description: In a communication sent last week, the ED asked Interpol to desist from providing information about the ED’s RN request to Choksi. The ED has said this because the Interpol’s queries against its request are based on objections raised by the fugitive jeweller.

articles.author: Lalmani Verma
articles.title: PM Narendra Modi targets Congress: ‘Failed in govt, failed in Opposition’
articles.description: Prime Minister targeted the “grand alliance” of the Opposition, saying that those who have no political or ideological understanding, who cannot even tolerate each other, are embracing each other.

articles.author: Khushboo Narayan
articles.title: PNB Fraud case: Nirav Modi routed scam cash to US firm, says court examiner
articles.description: Nirav Modi has been accused of diverting over Rs 4,000 crore of the Rs 6,519 crore outstanding fraudulent LoUs issued by PNB to his firms.

articles.author: IE Online
articles.title: BJP frames 2019 battle: Our New India vs their ‘Modi roko abhiyan’
articles.description: Insisting that the Opposition was only “daydreaming” and looking for alternatives, Javadekar said his party will get more votes and seats in 2019 than in past elections.

articles.author: Jane Dalton, Jane Dalton
articles.title: MPs condemn government inaction in Syria, saying price for failure to intervene 'unacceptably high'
articles.description: Working group calls on ministers to urgently design an atrocity prevention strategy plan

articles.author: Neil MacFarquhar, Neil MacFarquhar
articles.title: Two Russian women acquitted of murdering abusive husbands in rare court decisions
articles.description: 'It is very difficult to explain in Russia that domestic violence is not a family conflict, it is violence'

articles.title: Prashant Kishor will not campaign for any party in 2019 Lok Sabha polls
articles.description: One of India's most sought-after political strategists Prashant Kishor said that he will not work as campaigner during 2019 Lok Sabha polls.

articles.title: Will not campaign for any party for 2019 polls: Prashant Kishor
articles.description: One of India's most sought after political strategists Prashant Kishor shocked many as he announced his retirement from election campaigning for political parties.

articles.title: Prashant Kishor will not campaign for any party in 2019 Lok Sabha polls
articles.description: Prashant Kishor, one of India's most sought-after political strategists, has said he will not work as a campaigner during the 2019 Lok Sabha polls.

articles.title: Mahagathbandhan A Compulsion, Vindication Of BJP's Success, Says PM Modi
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday scoffed at opposition efforts to forge a Mahagathbandhan for the 2019 Lok Sabha elections, saying it was nothing but their compulsion and a vindication of the BJP-led government's success.

articles.author: Raakhi Jagga
articles.title: Don’t make statements, take desecration matter to court: Parkash Singh Badal dares Congress
articles.description: Claiming that there was a threat to “SAD-BJP brotherhood” in the current atmosphere, he said, “I have been in politics for the last 70 years, but I will not let the divide and rule policy of the Congress work.

articles.author: Abantika Ghosh
articles.title: PM Narendra Modi to launch PMJAY in Jharkhand; 22 states ready
articles.description: PMJAY, announced in the Union Budget this year as the National Health Protection Mission, will provide an annual health cover of Rs 5 lakh to 10.74 crore families.

articles.author: Andrea Piras
articles.title: Italia U21, Mancini: "Accettiamo le critiche di Sacchi"
articles.description: Il difensore dell'Italia Under 21 Gianluca Mancini ha parlato ai microfoni di Rai Sport rispondendo alle critiche di Sacchi dopo la sconfitta in Slovacchia: "Accettiamo le sue critiche, ci metteremo subito al lavoro per fare le cose nel migliore dei modi....
